programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Chris is here today to tell his girlfriend, Chrissy, about his sexual fetish. Next we meet Mistress Tara, the dominatrix who caters to Chris' fantasy. We'll watch him pretend to be a dog.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Do You Have A Gay Double Life?
programme.desc: After finding porn and several email and text exchanges with transsexuals, Quintiqua is demanding that her boyfriend prove if he is bi-sexual or not! Then, Herb dug up proof in the form of pictures of Carl and a woman named Deanna online.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Think My Wife Is A Prostitute
programme.desc: David believes his wife Shamonda is cheating on him and that she might be having sex for money! Plus, Matt believes that his girlfriend is a prostitute. She admits she has accepted money and gifts from men, but swears she gave nothing in return.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Tacarra has been with Jaray for 5 years and raising two children together. But now she feels the passion has died and his coldness towards her has driven her crazy, and now she questions her marriage, and Jaray's honesty.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Did You Bite and Beat My Son?
programme.desc: Lorri is here because she believes that her grandson is being abused by his mother Alyssa and her ex-boyfriend Josh. She's here to find out the truth about whether or not they are really guilty of this abuse.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Where's That Fight For Your Son?
programme.desc: Colleen's son, Dalton has suffered with cancer for ten years. Patrick, the boy's father, left the picture when Dalton was only an infant, and after falling on hard times ended up homeless. But now he wants to be back in Dalton's life.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Teen Would Kill For the Klan
programme.desc: Misguided youth ... 15-year-old Gala is having some serious and dangerous issues with race and her mother Tanya believes she needs to change. Her out of control behavior has her sneaking out of the house, sleeping around with older men, and skipping school. Gala argues this is the way she was raised, but her mother blames Gala's boyfriend Patrick. With her behavior escalating, Steve's trying everything he can for one last attempt to open her mind.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Angel claims that her father Ronald abused her sexually, forced her to do drugs and even got her addicted to crack when she was 18. His other daughter Tracy also claims he’s tried to abuse her several times, but Ronald says he’s innocent!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: There is nothing more serious than allegations of child abuse, but when all the testimonies are laid out, the stories just don't add up. Steve has the lie detector results and will reveal the truth once and for all.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Your Kids Need Their Mom, But You Chose Him
programme.desc: A couple's children are taken away after the six-month-old nearly dies from having a baby wipe lodged in her windpipe; Shawn says his daughter came home with severe bruising on her body after staying with her mother and told him her mother beat her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Had a Threesome: Who's the Dad?
programme.desc: Tasha wants to prove to her ex boyfriend Martin that he's the father of her 4 year old daughter. Martin's sister says that she thinks the child might belong to her boyfriend Terrence because they had a threesome a year ago. Who's the real father?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: A mom, addicted to PCP, repeatedly abuses her daughter. She even forced her daughter to lie about her abusive boyfriend just so he could get out of jail.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Gina separated from her husband Nate because she could never get along with his family. But Nate says that he's always had suspicions that their child wasn't really his. Then, Damond says that he doubts that he's the real father of Kendahl's child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: At 12, Crystal dated 20 year old Matt and was pregnant at 13. He served 15 months in prison for criminal sexual assault on a minor and is a registered sex offender. Are they a product of inappropriate love or just misunderstood?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Katrina is fed up with her boyfriend Ismael's abusive and controlling ways. Katrina says Ismael acts this way because he believes she has been cheating. Then, Christie has been married to Chris for 8 months and he already suspects her infidelity.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Angelica says John "checks her" for signs of cheating every time she comes home. She wants a lie detector test to prove she's been faithful! Then, Ashley she found out that her boyfriend, TJ, had cheated on her when she was 8 months pregnant.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Destiny says that her daughter has unexplained bruises after visiting Brian. She also says the child told her someone grabbed her neck and threw her against a wall. Brian denies the abuse and believes that it is either Destiny or her boyfriend.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 6 Kids Taken Away, but I Want More
programme.desc: Danielle’s children were taken out of her care after cops observed all 4 children, including her newborn, home alone. Her fifth and sixth babies were taken from her care, too. But she wants to prove that she could be a good mom!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Loretta and Joseph have been together for 2 years and have a young son together. She says that when she was pregnant, he punched and pulled her hair. She claims that she’s been faithful but Joseph isn’t convinced. Who’s telling the truth?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: After 10 years of searching, Brenda will reunite with her kids and address abuse allegations. Then, Cassidy wed Paul 5 days after she split with PJ, but is he molesting her and PJ’s son? Or is PJ the monster who burned their son’s feet?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Maria is convinced that her son’s ex-girlfriend Amy and her new boyfriend Brian are abusing and neglecting her granddaughter. But Amy says that Maria is racist and angry because her granddaughter is being raised in a Hispanic household

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: A woman is married to one man and engaged to another at the same time. Now the two men are fighting over who's the father of her kids.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Will You Stay To Get Beat?
programme.desc: Ashley alleges that her fiancé John has repeatedly abused both her and her son. To make matters worse, this isn't John's first incident with abuse, as his former girlfriend, another Ashley, was also abused and is now here to save her friend.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Perry and Stephanie started having an affair while Ashley was at rehab. Now Ashley is here to confront Perry for not taking responsibility for their daughter. Then, after they split up, Amanda started accusing James' new girlfriend of being abusive.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: How Can You Still Love Him?
programme.desc: Joyia is desperate to keep her friend Stephanie from going back to her abusive boyfriend Scott. If Stephanie takes him back, Scott will continue to abuse her. But she still loves him! Will she have the strength to leave him?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Did You Leave My Kids to Die?
programme.desc: Russell wants to put his family back together after his 3 children died in a fire. Next, Tatiana believes her 2-year old nephew was abused. And she's accusing her sister's ex-fiance Chris. Chris says he's not an abuser.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: If I Don't Hit Her, She Doesn't Listen
programme.desc: Kelsey says her husband is abusing her. Malcolm believes that Kelsey has been cheating on him since the beginning and that their two kids may belong to another man. Plus, Carrie's boyfriend Chris thinks their child belongs to her ex.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Today on Steve Wilkos, Steven is desperate to find out who is the real father of his 3 year old son. He found out that his ex, Shannon, was intimate with 3 of his best friends when she got pregnant.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I'm Not Sorry I Beat Her
programme.desc: Taylor and Joseph admit to getting into violent arguments where he slapped, choked, scratched and even threw objects at her, but agree that if they can prove neither cheated, then their violent streak will end. But will it end?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Bobbie says that her daughter Cindy’s home was filled with so many dangerous animals that she was forced to report her to child protective services because she felt her grandchild was in danger. But Cindy says Bobbie has another agenda!
